attributes.action: Reject the privatisation of Royal Mail in any form, whether full or partial. Therefore we call on the Prime Minister to reject the selling of a minority stake in Royal Mail, as a form of partial privatisation. Furthermore, we call on the Prime Minister to maintain the Royal Mail as a fully integrated and 100% publicly owned company, providing a high quality public service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
